title: The title of Hyperlink Builder changes with settings
OB: When clicking on 'OK' and reopening the Hyperlink Builder, the actual result is that the title becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The expected result is for the Hyperlink Builder title to be 'Hyperlink Options'.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'. 2. Open the Hyperlink Builder by clicking on the created hyperlink label. 3. Click on 'OK' to confirm the changes. 4. Reopen the Hyperlink Builder and observe the title change.
